column2: Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Walk over with maintenance supervisor and foreperson
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - All services located and marked. Permits issued
Acceptance Criteria - Permits issued and received by qualified staff only
Verifying Document - Relative permits to be kept in work pack
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Check the work pack checklist
Acceptance Criteria - Copy of work pack with all documents
Verifying Document - As per site meeting
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Apply environmental controls to site. Witches hats, silt socks, water for concrete saw
Acceptance Criteria - Consider drainage, noise, dust, weather.
Verifying Document - Refer to DN- ZH-FM028.2
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Cut the existing footpath to the full depth of asphalt
Acceptance Criteria - Cut in straight line and regular shape
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Dig out the existing footpath to the pavement depth.
Acceptance Criteria - Visual subgrade inspection by site Foreperson
Verifying Document - Refer RITS 3.4.9.3 & Drawing D3.3.5
4.4 - Preparing subgrade(If Subgrade fails Visual inspection)
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Subgrade shall be further compacted and replaced with Suitable material.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Pegs spaced every 750 max from centre to centre and edge boards shall be 75 x 25.
Verifying Document - Refer to RITS D3.6.1
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Make up existing base preparation where required. It will change on as per suitable vehicle crossing.
Acceptance Criteria - Clegg hammer value shall not less than 12 after 4 blows
Verifying Document - Refer to RITS D3.3.5
Frequency - Throughout the activity Clegg Every 10m
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Asphalt layer 25mm. 40mm for vehicle crossings.
Acceptance Criteria - String line from top of both sides of boxing.
Verifying Document - Refer to RITS D3.3.5 & RITS 3.4.9.8
Frequency - Every 10m for the duration of the project
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Berms reinstated with top soil and grass seeded. Site to be swept
Acceptance Criteria - Minimum of 100mm of topsoil and a good amount of grass seed applied.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Area measured? Any visual crack observed? Photos taken? As-built updated?
Frequency - After the completion of job
